description.p: FontForge is a font editor for outline and bitmap fonts that lets you create, edit, or convert, a range of fonts, including PostScript, TrueType, OpenType, cid-keyed, multi-master, cff, SVG and BitMap (bdf, FON, NFNT) fonts.
FontForge is free Open Source Software written to run on various computer operating systems. You can use FontForge Graphically or as a command-line tool.
Learning to use FontForge is easy, and there are various tutorials available beginning with the basics up to more advanced features such as making and using scripts.

FontForge — редактор контурних та растрових шрифтів, за допомогою якого ви можете створювати, редагувати та перетворювати шрифти у форматах PostScript, TrueType, OpenType, cid-keyed, multi-master, cff, SVG та растрових (bdf, FON, NFNT).

FontForge — um editor de fontes para fontes outline e de bitmap que lhe permite criar, editar ou converter, uma série de fontes, incluindo PostScript, TrueType, OpenType, cid-keyed, multi-master, cff, SVG e de bitmap (bdf, FON, NFNT) fontes.
Aprender a usar FontForge é fácil, e existem vários tutoriais disponíveis que começam com o básico até mais recursos avançados, como fazer e usar scripts.
